bioconda.name: smalt
bioconda.summary: SMALT aligns DNA sequencing reads with a reference genome.

biocontainers.name: smalt
biocontainers.summary: Aligns dna sequencing reads with a reference genome. reads from a wide range of sequencing platforms can be processed except for solid reads.

biotools.summary: Aligns DNA sequencing reads with a reference genome. Reads from a wide range of sequencing platforms can be processed except for SOLiD reads.

bioschemas.name: Smalt
bioschemas.summary: Aligns DNA sequencing reads with a reference genome. Reads from a wide range of sequencing platforms can be processed except for SOLiD reads.
